input: How do I reset my password?
expected_output:
To reset your password, please follow these steps:
1. Go to the login page
2. Click on the 'Forgot Password' link
3. Enter your email address
4. Check your email for reset instructions
5. Follow the link in the email
6. Create a new password

If you don't receive the email within a few minutes, please check your spam folder. If you still need assistance, contact our support team at support@example.com.

input: Can I get a refund for my subscription?
expected_output:
Yes, we offer refunds according to our refund policy. For subscriptions, you can request a refund within 14 days of purchase for a full refund. After 14 days, refunds are prorated based on the unused portion of your subscription.

To request a refund:
1. Log into your account
2. Go to Billing & Subscription
3. Select the subscription
4. Click on 'Request Refund'

Our team will review your request within 1-2 business days. If you have any questions, please contact our billing department at billing@example.com.

input: How do I cancel my subscription?
expected_output:
You can cancel your subscription at any time through your account settings. Here's how:

1. Log into your account
2. Go to Settings > Subscription
3. Click on 'Cancel Subscription'
4. Follow the prompts to confirm cancellation

Important notes about cancellation:
- You'll still have access to your subscription until the end of your current billing period
- We don't provide partial refunds for the unused portion of the current billing period
- You can reactivate your subscription anytime before the end of your current billing period

If you're having any issues with the service that are causing you to cancel, our support team would be happy to help resolve them - just contact support@example.com.

input: What payment methods do you accept?
expected_output:
We accept the following payment methods:

- Credit cards: Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover
- Debit cards with Visa or Mastercard logo
- PayPal
- Apple Pay (on iOS devices)
- Google Pay (on Android devices)
- Bank transfers (for annual business subscriptions only)

All payments are processed securely, and your payment information is encrypted. We do not store your full credit card details on our servers.

If you have any issues with payment processing or need to discuss alternative payment options, please contact our billing team at billing@example.com.
